short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allting is an analysis and collaboration tool dedicated to improving your meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the Allting chrome extension to be able to use Allting seamlessly when you’re having meetings!

Allting is an AI-powered meeting facilitator and activity tracker that enables you and your participants to achieve tangible improvements in productivity, inclusion, and engagement by:

⭐ Providing flags to interact and influence, as well as collecting feedback in real-time
⭐ Analyzing your meetings and tracking your progress
⭐ Presenting AI-based actionable insights and coaching to help improve your meetings

With Allting you can be better prepared ahead of meetings, achieve better results with active participation during meetings, and learn what can be improved after each meeting.

In-Meeting
▪️ Flags: Let participants influence the meeting in real-time using flags, such as Off-topic, Park, Discussion, Decision, and Move on.

▪️ Energy Meter: Learn about the energy in the "room" by letting participants indicate their energy level.

▪️ Feedback: Enable participants to give one-click feedback towards the end of the meeting to drive engagement and improvement.

Post-Meeting
▪️ Meeting Score: View after each meeting and see how well you’re performing over time.

▪️ Productivity- & Engagement Score: Evaluate how productive and engaging your meetings are.

▪️ Coaching: Get actionable insights and coaching to boost your performance.

▪️ Live interactions: Learn how participants interact with flags during meetings.

▪️ Feedback: Get a deeper understanding of the participant's perception of your meetings.

Install the Allting chrome extension now and let Allting be your intelligent sidekick in your upcoming meetings!
